alert.note: Alert for Benton; Crawford; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 9:32PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Benton, western Madison, northwestern Crawford, Washington and northeastern Adair Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 931 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles north of Lincoln, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Siloam Springs... Huntsville... Natural Dam... Lowell... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Elkins... Tontitown... West Fork... Lincoln... Cave Springs... Westville... Greenland... Highfill... Garfield... Winslow... Watts... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 37 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
